de.dezibel.gui

Class MediumPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • de.dezibel.gui.DragablePanel
              • de.dezibel.gui.MediumPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.javadocking.dockable.DraggableContent, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MediumPanel
extends DragablePanel
    A small panel, which shows the medium details Comments can be selected and the comment-text will be displayed in a separate text-area.
    Author:
    Pascal
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
